body: Hi LHOR, A number of components in your file are updated but not all of them. You need to update all of the components either using the update component or manually from the tab. The error happens because the maximum number of layers for construction in EnergyPlus is 10 and your construction has 11 layers. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/0ePsIRXUiU8v02GVJZPgktGus2jVL07FjDNWJZUkF95CprlpvVV6cSc5mKgMeqdfygkETGhSHCTwTmY3ysfDVZwvhULtNLaW/maximumNumOfLayers.PNG)
